name: Egg Mayo Sandwich Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Egg Mayo Sandwich Recipe: Boiled egg chopped 6 Mayonnaise 1 cup Salt 1 tsp Black pepper 1 tsp Bread slices 6 Ice berg shredded 1-1/2 cup
instructions: In bowl boiled chopped egg, mayonnaise, salt and black pepper mix . Now toast the bread and add Shereded ice berg. Then add egg mixture and keep the top toast and serve it.
